  const calculateAverageScore = (resultData: Record<string, number> | undefined, prefix: string): number => {    if (!resultData) return 0;        // resultDataã®ã‚­ãƒ¼ã®ã†ã¡ã€æŒ‡å®šãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã§å§‹ã¾ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ï¼ˆä¾‹: "h1", "h12"ï¼‰ã‚’æŠ½å‡º    const keys = Object.keys(resultData).filter(key => key.startsWith(prefix) && !isNaN(resultData[key]));        if (keys.length === 0) return 0;        // åˆè¨ˆã‚’è¨ˆç®—    const total = keys.reduce((sum, key) => sum + Number(resultData[key]), 0);        // å¹³å‡ã‚’è¿”ã™ (ã“ã‚Œã§2å•ã§ã‚‚16å•ã§ã‚‚å¯¾å¿œå¯èƒ½)    return total / keys.length;  };  // KAIã‚„OSIVQãªã©ã€ç‰¹å®šã®IDãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã«åŸºã¥ã„ãŸåˆè¨ˆ/å¹³å‡ã‚’å‡ºã—ãŸã„å ´åˆ  const calculateSumOrAvg = (resultData: Record<string, number> | undefined, ids: string[], mode: 'sum' | 'avg' = 'sum'): number => {    if (!resultData) return 0;    let total = 0;    let count = 0;        ids.forEach(id => {      if (typeof resultData[id] === 'number') {        total += resultData[id];        count++;      }    });    if (count === 0) return 0;    return mode === 'avg' ? total / count : total;  };
